Attacks.Name: Bullet Punch
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Scizor gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character is pushed away.

Attacks.Name: Knock Off
Attacks.Effect: If damage is dealt, the target character loses 1 power.

Attacks.Name: Superpower
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Scizor receives 1 power. If a wild is rolled, this attack causes stagger on the target.

Superpowers.Name: Swords Dance
Superpowers.Effect: Scizor gains 2 power. The next physical attack made by Scizor this turn adds 2 dice to its attack roll.

Superpowers.Name: Light Metal
Superpowers.Effect: Scizor reduces the power cost of all physical attacks by 1 to a minimum of 1.

Attacks.Name: Metal Claw
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character gains the Bleed special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Evolutionary Adaptation
Superpowers.Effect: When Scizor is injured, it can play this ability to gain 3 power and increase its physical attack strength by 1 for the rest of the game.
